org.apache.flink.core.fs

类 AbstractMultiFSDataInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • org.apache.flink.core.fs.FSDataInputStream
        • org.apache.flink.core.fs.AbstractMultiFSDataInputStream
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    直接已知子类:
    MultiStreamStateHandle.MultiFSDataInputStream

    @Internal
public abstract class AbstractMultiFSDataInputStream
extends FSDataInputStream
    Abstract base class for wrappers over multiple FSDataInputStream, which gives a contiguous view on all inner streams and makes them look like a single stream, in which we can read, seek, etc.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected FSDataInputStream delegate
      Inner stream for the currently accessed segment of the virtual global stream.
      protected long totalAvailable
      Total available bytes in the virtual global stream.
      protected long totalPos
      Position in the virtual global stream.

    • 方法详细资料

      • seek

        public void seek(long desired)
          throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: FSDataInputStream
        Seek to the given offset from the start of the file. The next read() will be from that location. Can't seek past the end of the file.
        指定者:
        seek 在类中 FSDataInputStream
        参数:
        desired - the desired offset
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if an error occurred while seeking inside the input stream.

      • getPos

        public long getPos()
            throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: FSDataInputStream
        Gets the current position in the input stream.
        指定者:
        getPos 在类中 FSDataInputStream
        返回:
        current position in the input stream
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurred in the underlying stream implementation while accessing the stream's position.

      • getSeekedStreamForOffset

        protected abstract FSDataInputStream getSeekedStreamForOffset(long globalStreamOffset)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Delivers a the right stream for the given global stream offset. The returned stream is already seeked to the right local offset that correctly reflects the global offset.
        参数:
        globalStreamOffset - the global offset to which we seek
        返回:
        a sub-stream, seeked to the correct local offset w.r.t. the global offset.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
